title: The Path Is Steep!
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Nozomi-san.... I have something to ask of you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hm? What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I.... got the “Washi Washi trial version” from Ayumu-san. Then.... I practiced the “Washi Washi trial version” with Hanpen<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eeeh....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Please teach me.... The real “Washi Washi”. Rina-chan’s board「Bowing」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Umm--.... Let’s see....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Is my training.... still not enough....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>....Yeah, let’s practice a little bit more, okay. The path to “Washi Washi” is a steep one~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’ll do my best. Rina-chan’s board「Fired Up」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Then, let’s start with some warm-up, shall we? Huuug~~~~!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I.... won’t lose. Griiiiip!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
